snippet.title: Card of Legend: Awaken Angels - Official Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
CARD OF LEGEND: Awaken Angels, a groundbreaking card battle game from developer ANCHORNODE, is making waves in the subculture gaming world. 
Set in a rich fantasy universe, the game immerses players in an epic battle where heroes, aided by angels, fight to prevent the resurrection of an evil demon lord. 
The game boasts 129 beautifully crafted angel characters, each with their unique backstory, blending perfectly into human society but unaware of their divine origins.

Adventure Mode (Roguelike): Players progress with a deck of 40 cards, facing over 10 battles and aiming to defeat the final boss without a single loss. The unique Blessing (Skill) system sets it apart from traditional TCGs.            
Training Mode (Tower of Trials): Standard TCG combat with a 20-card deck. As players ascend the tower, the rewards become more lucrative.            
Arena (PvP): Competitive multiplayer battles where victory earns players rank and tier progression. However, rank-related rewards will not be available in the demo version.            
Card Enhancement: Players can upgrade their cards by combining purchased and material cards.            
Card Shop: The exclusive source for acquiring cards, available through guaranteed purchases.            
Card Collection: A comprehensive archive where players can track their acquired cards.            
Tutorial: An introductory guide for new players.
